mapper.insert: insert ignore into feast_seckill_success(seckill_id, user_phone, state) values (#{seckillId}, #{userPhone}, 0)
mapper.select: select sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.gmt_create, sk.state, s.seckill_id "seckill.seckill_id", s.name "seckill.name", s.number "seckill.number", s.start_time "seckill.start_time", s.end_time "seckill.end_time", s.gmt_create "seckill.gmt_create" from feast_seckill_success sk inner join feast_seckill s on sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id=#{seckillId} and sk.user_phone=#{userPhone}
